column4: Quick question... does Ubuntu come with a command-line program that will let me grab a single image (or a segment of video) from a webcam?  I can use programs like Cheese (using GStreamer for configuration) and they work fine, but I need something that I can script.
not by default, but you can install it: camE
it's a gamble, to be sure, but I would say that it's not a problem more than 90% of the time
